channel.title: Restless ghost quest
channel.description:
Some information to those helping with the moparclassic project:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- -----------Quest ID (5): Restless Ghost quest------------------------- ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Quest Start: Priest
Npc iDs: ID: 9 Priest - coords: 111, 667 ID: 10 Urhney- coords: 117, 710 ID: 15 Ghost - coords: 106, 673
Item IDS: ID: 24 Ghostspeak Amulet ID: 27 skull - coords: 218, 3521
Object IDS: ID: 40 Coffin - coords: 103, 675
NPC/OBJECT Quest Stages :
Priest: 1) Talk to Priest(Stage 0):-------------------------------------------- -- http://pastebin.com/Zg5mARza 2) Retalking to Priest(Stage 1)------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/qHaHBcXe 3) Talking to Priest(After you talk to Urhney)(Stage 2)------------------ http://pastebin.com/U7wnFY87 4) Talking to Priest(After talking to ghost "with" ammy)(Stage 3)----- http://pastebin.com/pfbnw7Fu 5) Talking to Priest(After retrieving skull but hasnt put in coffin yet)(Stage 4)--- http://pastebin.com/FhJKrTYq 6) Talking to Priesting after completing quest(Stage 5)----------------- http://pastebin.com/wsUS2uR0
Ghost: 1) Talking to Ghost without ammy(Stage 0)------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/hyxeDt4R 2)Talking to ghost with "ammy wielded" of ghostspeak(Stage 1)------- http://pastebin.com/zdfVpUP5 3)Re-talking to ghost after accepting to try and help him(Stage 2)----- http://pastebin.com/4VnMfj34 4)Finding skull then talking to ghost, "without" putting it in coffin(Stage 3)---- http://pastebin.com/Z1XQAs7U 5)Ghost disappears after putting skull in coffin(Stage 4)----- (remove npc id 15, if quest stage= 4)
Urhney: 1)Talking Urhney(Stage 0)------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/frRscnax 2)Talking to Urhney(Stage 1)---------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/UdvbNaPP 3)Retalking to Urhney after recieving amulet of ghostspeak ammy/Talking to Urhney after completing quest(Stage 2)-------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/frRscnax
Using skull on coffin-------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/t8d1G2B7
Searching coffin: 1)Search coffin(Stage 0)-------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/D0AY6j3z 2) search coffin after quest complete(Stage 1)--------------------------- http://pastebin.com/LAV0eGMy
Missing information: None
Notes: Attempting to pick up skull: a level 19 skeleton attacks you.
------------------------------------------------------

item.title: Restless ghost quest
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

Some information to those helping with the moparclassic project:

-----------Quest ID (5): Restless Ghost quest-------------------------

Quest Start: Priest

Npc iDs:
ID: 9 Priest - coords: 111, 667
ID: 10 Urhney- coords: 117, 710
ID: 15 Ghost - coords: 106, 673

Item IDS:
ID: 24 Ghostspeak Amulet
ID: 27 skull - coords: 218, 3521

Object IDS:
ID: 40 Coffin - coords: 103, 675

NPC/OBJECT Quest Stages :

Priest:

  1. Talk to Priest(Stage 0):-------------------------------------------- – http://pastebin.com/Zg5mARza
  2. Retalking to Priest(Stage 1)------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/qHaHBcXe
  3. Talking to Priest(After you talk to Urhney)(Stage 2)------------------ http://pastebin.com/U7wnFY87
  4. Talking to Priest(After talking to ghost “with” ammy)(Stage 3)----- http://pastebin.com/pfbnw7Fu
  5. Talking to Priest(After retrieving skull but hasnt put in coffin yet)(Stage 4)— http://pastebin.com/FhJKrTYq
  6. Talking to Priesting after completing quest(Stage 5)----------------- http://pastebin.com/wsUS2uR0

Ghost:

  1. Talking to Ghost without ammy(Stage 0)------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/hyxeDt4R
    2)Talking to ghost with “ammy wielded” of ghostspeak(Stage 1)------- http://pastebin.com/zdfVpUP5
    3)Re-talking to ghost after accepting to try and help him(Stage 2)----- http://pastebin.com/4VnMfj34
    4)Finding skull then talking to ghost, “without” putting it in coffin(Stage 3)---- http://pastebin.com/Z1XQAs7U
    5)Ghost disappears after putting skull in coffin(Stage 4)----- (remove npc id 15, if quest stage= 4)

Urhney:
1)Talking Urhney(Stage 0)------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/frRscnax
2)Talking to Urhney(Stage 1)---------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/UdvbNaPP
3)Retalking to Urhney after recieving amulet of ghostspeak ammy/Talking to Urhney after completing quest(Stage 2)-------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/frRscnax

Using skull on coffin-------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/t8d1G2B7

Searching coffin:
1)Search coffin(Stage 0)-------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/D0AY6j3z
2) search coffin after quest complete(Stage 1)--------------------------- http://pastebin.com/LAV0eGMy

Missing information:
None

Notes: Attempting to pick up skull: a level 19 skeleton attacks you.
